MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Corsock, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.20pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to grounded overhead lines near to Glenmuir and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.04pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
